headline: Why Blackstone Group Stock Skyrocketed by Nearly 7% on Monday
summary: It's apparently the front-runner to buy a large utility company in the Southwest U.S.  Electricity utilities are increasingly juicy investment targets because of the power needs of artificial intelligence technology.  Ever-acquisitive financial services titan Blackstone Group (NYSE: BX) might soon be the owner of a big utility, if a media report is to be believed.

headline: Blackstone in talks to buy utility TXNM, source says
summary: The infrastructure investing arm ofasset manager Blackstone is in talks to buy New Mexicoand Texas-focused utility TXNM Energy, a person familiar withthe matter said on Monday. ...
